value.name: Aaron Martin loved Hamilton Accies spell as he admits future is unresolved
value.description: Aaron Martin admits his future is undecided but he loved his time at Hamilton despite the difficulties of being away from his family.  The 31 year-old stayed in a hotel while his young family remained in Southampton during his time at Accies.
